Document.Title: Title
Document.AcceptConfirm: Do you really want to accept this document?

Email.ConnectionDescription: Configure the inbox from which documents are imported.
Email.PasswordMaskedNotice: Password is set (*****). Edit the field to change it.
Email.SaveError: E-mail settings could not be saved.
Email.LoadError: E-mail settings could not be loaded.
Email.CountLoadError: E-mail count could not be retrieved.
Email.CriteriaDescription: Define filters for which messages should be imported.
Email.CriteriaSaveError: Fetch rules could not be saved.
Email.CriteriaDeleteError: Fetch rules could not be removed.
Email.CriteriaLoadError: Fetch rules could not be loaded.
Email.CriteriaValidationError: Please check the fetch rules inputs.

Hints.Provider: Type of mail provider to connect to (IMAP/POP3/Exchange).
Hints.Server: Hostname or IP address of the mail server.
Hints.Port: Network port used by the mail server (e.g. 993 for IMAP over TLS).
Hints.Username: The username to authenticate with the mail server.
Hints.Password: The password for the mail account. Leave blank to keep the existing password.
Hints.DisplayName: A friendly name shown in the UI for this mailbox.
Hints.DefaultFolder: Default folder to read messages from (e.g. INBOX).
Hints.UseSsl: Whether to use SSL/TLS when connecting to the mail server.
Hints.AutoReconnect: Automatically reconnect if the connection is lost.

Criteria.Name: A short name to identify this fetch rule.
Criteria.Description: Optional description explaining what the rule does.
Criteria.Folder: Target folder in the mailbox to match messages from.
Criteria.SubjectContains: Import messages whose subject contains this text.
Criteria.FromContains: Import messages from senders that contain this text.
Criteria.ToContains: Import messages sent to recipients that contain this text.
Criteria.DateFrom: Only import messages from this date onwards.
Criteria.DateTo: Only import messages up to this date.
Criteria.HasAttachments: Filter messages by whether they have attachments.
Criteria.MaxResults: Maximum number of messages to fetch per run.
Criteria.MaxDaysBack: Look back this many days when fetching messages.
Criteria.Skip: Number of matching messages to skip (useful for paging).
Criteria.SortBy: Field used to sort matched messages before importing.
Criteria.SortDescending: Sort in descending order when enabled.
Criteria.IncludeFlags: Comma-separated IMAP flags that messages must include.
Criteria.ExcludeFlags: Comma-separated IMAP flags that exclude messages from import.

ShareGroups.ListDescription: Organize teams that should access shared documents together.
ShareGroups.EmptyState: No share groups have been created yet.

Form.Description: Set up a name and members for document sharing.
Form.MembersHint: Members will gain access to all documents shared with this group.

Toast.SaveError: Share group could not be saved.
Toast.DeleteError: Share group could not be deleted.
Toast.UsersLoadError: Could not load the user list.
